docs.text: Welcome to docs.cloudpilgrim.io The purpose of this site is to provide quick and easy access to useful bits of documentation. Below are some quick access links to documentation. Amazon Web Services AWS CLI EKS Kubernetes Kubectl Markdown cheatsheet Markdown
docs.title: Home

docs.text: The purpose of this site is to provide quick and easy access to useful bits of documentation. Below are some quick access links to documentation.
docs.title: Welcome to docs.cloudpilgrim.io

docs.text: AWS CLI SSM Insert parameter into parameter store aws ssm put-parameter --name " $PARAM_NAME " --type SecureString --value " $PARAM_VALUE " --key-id alias/ $KMS_KEY_NAME Retrieve parameter aws ssm get-parameter --name " $PARAM_NAME " --with-decryption --region eu-west-2 --output text --query 'Parameter.Value'
docs.title: AWS-CLI

docs.text: Insert parameter into parameter store aws ssm put-parameter --name " $PARAM_NAME " --type SecureString --value " $PARAM_VALUE " --key-id alias/ $KMS_KEY_NAME Retrieve parameter aws ssm get-parameter --name " $PARAM_NAME " --with-decryption --region eu-west-2 --output text --query 'Parameter.Value'
docs.title: SSM

docs.text: EKS Config Update Kube config aws eks update-kubeconfig --name $CLUSTERNAME
docs.title: EKS

docs.text: Update Kube config aws eks update-kubeconfig --name $CLUSTERNAME
docs.title: Config

docs.text: Kubectl Shell Connect to a pod using bash kubectl exec -n $NAMESPACE --stdin --tty $PODNAME -- /bin/bash
docs.title: Kubectl

docs.text: Connect to a pod using bash kubectl exec -n $NAMESPACE --stdin --tty $PODNAME -- /bin/bash
docs.title: Shell
